Points and patches
• Point features can be used to find a sparse set of corresponding locations in 
different images, often as a precursor to computing camera pose , which is a 
prerequisite for computing a denser set of correspondences using stereo 
matching. 
◦ Image alignment
◦ Object instance recognition
• A key advantage of keypoints is that they permit matching even in the presence 
of clutter (occlusion) and large scale and orientation changes.
